dcterms:description: The CC2017 dataset includes fMRI data from 3 subjects who view a variety of movie clips, with a temporal resolution of 2 seconds. It consists of 4320 training samples and 1200 test samples.
dcterms:title: CC2017

dcterms:creator: D. S. Marcus

dcterms:description: The HCP dataset is part of the Human Connectome Project, encompassing BOLD responses from 158 subjects. For this study, three subjects were selected, with a repetition time of 1 second.
dcterms:title: HCP

dcterms:creator: R. M. Cichy
K. Dwivedi
B. Lahner
A. Lascelles
P. Iamshchinina
M. Graumann
A. Andonian
N. A. R. Murty
K. Kay
G. Roig
dcterms:description: The Algonauts2021 dataset consists of fMRI data from 10 participants who viewed 1100 silent videos of everyday events, each approximately 3 seconds long.
dcterms:title: Algonauts2021
